item.title: Tomato, Sunrise Bumble Bee
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: Fresh as first morning light, ‘Sunrise Bumble Bee’ bursts with refreshing sweet tang. The cheerful, marbled, red and yellow cherry-type fruits, weighing just under an ounce, add a burst of color as they gleam on vigorous plants. Indeterminate. (120.000đ/25 seeds)
item.content:encoded:
Fresh as first morning light, ‘Sunrise Bumble Bee’ bursts with refreshing sweet tang. The cheerful, marbled, red and yellow cherry-type fruits, weighing just under an ounce, add a burst of color as they gleam on vigorous plants. Indeterminate.

(120.000đ/25 seeds)

item.title: Tomato, Sweet Tangerine Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: These delectable tomatoes ripen early for so large a fruit. This Sae exclusive features clean, bushy, plants that are quite disease resistant and set very heavy crops. Even in hot weather watch for Tangerine to be ready for harvest in about 68 days. (150.000đ/30seeds)
item.content:encoded:
These delectable tomatoes ripen early for so large a fruit. This Sae exclusive features clean, bushy, plants that are quite disease resistant and set very heavy crops. Even in hot weather watch for Tangerine to be ready for harvest in about 68 days.

(150.000đ/30seeds)

item.title: Sunflower, Sun-Fill Green Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: Flower arrangement enthusiasts will be all over this unique selection! The colorful corona of the calyx—the spiky leaves at the base of the flower—is the show here. Like something out of a reverie, this delightfully unique sunflower will entice kids and adventurous gardeners. Cut flowers early before petals form for a dramatic addition to bouquets. […]
item.content:encoded:
Flower arrangement enthusiasts will be all over this unique selection! The colorful corona of the calyx—the spiky leaves at the base of the flower—is the show here. Like something out of a reverie, this delightfully unique sunflower will entice kids and adventurous gardeners. Cut flowers early before petals form for a dramatic addition to bouquets. Blooms are 3-4″ in diameter.

(170.000đ/25 seeds)

item.title: Sunflower, Ms. Mars
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: One uncommonly gorgeous sunflower! Standout variety’s flowers, leaves and stems are suffused with dark-red-to-purple hues. Low-growing, vigorously branching flame-type 20-30” tall sunflower’s merlot-colored ray petals transition to a pretty pink. Full sun. (150.000đ/50seeds)
item.content:encoded:
One uncommonly gorgeous sunflower! Standout variety’s flowers, leaves and stems are suffused with dark-red-to-purple hues. Low-growing, vigorously branching flame-type 20-30” tall sunflower’s merlot-colored ray petals transition to a pretty pink. Full sun.

(150.000đ/50seeds)

item.title: Sunflower, Chianti Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: The deepest red sunflower! Wine-red velvet petals are flecked with gold. Flowers are 3-4″ across on 4-5 ft. plants. Multiple branched and purple-stemmed, its dramatic in the garden. Pollenless, so its good for cutting, too. (130.000đ/50seed)
item.content:encoded:
The deepest red sunflower! Wine-red velvet petals are flecked with gold. Flowers are 3-4″ across on 4-5 ft. plants. Multiple branched and purple-stemmed, its dramatic in the garden. Pollenless, so its good for cutting, too.

(130.000đ/50seed)

item.title: Sunflower, Honey Bear
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: These precious beauties have incredibly lovable faces. Soft, furry, golden yellow double flowers are dramatically ringed with single, light yellow ray petals. Growing 5-6 ft. tall, with long-legged elegance, Honey Bear creates distinctive mass plantings, striking hedges and attractive screens for kitchen gardens. Stems are thick, erect and sturdy. (120.000đ/20seeds)
item.content:encoded:
These precious beauties have incredibly lovable faces. Soft, furry, golden yellow double flowers are dramatically ringed with single, light yellow ray petals. Growing 5-6 ft. tall, with long-legged elegance, Honey Bear creates distinctive mass plantings, striking hedges and attractive screens for kitchen gardens. Stems are thick, erect and sturdy.

(120.000đ/20seeds)

item.title: Sunflower, Little Becka Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: Do you believe in love at first sight? This compact charmer, just 3′ tall, dazzles with a profusion of 6″ flowers with luminous yellow halos, punch-red petals and golden picotees. The one-of-a-kind dwarf bicolor adds spark and excitement to borders or as cut flowers. Requires well-drained soil. Sun. (120.000đ/30seeds)
item.content:encoded:
Do you believe in love at first sight? This compact charmer, just 3′ tall, dazzles with a profusion of 6″ flowers with luminous yellow halos, punch-red petals and golden picotees. The one-of-a-kind dwarf bicolor adds spark and excitement to borders or as cut flowers. Requires well-drained soil. Sun.

(120.000đ/30seeds)

item.title: Sunflower, Italian White
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: Branching plants with creamy light yellow flowers. Flowers are a luminous, light creamy yellow with attractive dark center eyes. Blooms are produced in abundance on branching plants. Ideal for borders and cut flowers.
item.content:encoded:
Branching plants with creamy light yellow flowers.
Flowers are a luminous, light creamy yellow with attractive dark center eyes. Blooms are produced in abundance on branching plants. Ideal for borders and cut flowers.

item.title: Jobe’s Organics 9026 Fertilizer, 4 lb
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: Organic granular fertilizer; Fast acting fertilizer for vegetables and tomatoes for a more abundant harvest OMRI listed for organic gardening by USDA; Certified organic means no synthetic chemicals Contains Jobe Biozome; Extremely aggressive proprietary microorganism archaea that aggressively breaks down material for faster results Jobe’s Biozome improves soil conditions; Helps your garden resist disease, insects, […]
item.content:encoded:
• Organic granular fertilizer; Fast acting fertilizer for vegetables and tomatoes for a more abundant harvest
  • OMRI listed for organic gardening by USDA; Certified organic means no synthetic chemicals
  • Contains Jobe Biozome; Extremely aggressive proprietary microorganism archaea that aggressively breaks down material for faster results
  • Jobe’s Biozome improves soil conditions; Helps your garden resist disease, insects, drought and other unfavorable conditions within a growing season
  • Easy pour bag; Fertilizer analysis: (2-5-3) 1.5 pound resealable bag, (2-5-3) 4 pound bag, (2-5-3) 16 pound bag

item.title: Casa De Amor Rose Care Organic Essential Fertilizer for Rose Plants, Brown (900 Gram)
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: 100% Organic, Rose Care , Complete Care for Your Rose Plants Boosts Branching and Flowering APPLICATION & DOSE: When topping up soil for potted plant, apply 40-50 gm before watering the plant during early morning or late evening. Water the plants immediately after the application. Apply the product every 2 weeks. Please do not spray […]
item.content:encoded:
• 100% Organic, Rose Care , Complete Care for Your Rose Plants
  • Boosts Branching and Flowering
  • APPLICATION & DOSE: When topping up soil for potted plant, apply 40-50 gm before watering the plant during early morning or late evening. Water the plants immediately after the application. Apply the product every 2 weeks.
  • Please do not spray or use any ‘chemical fungicide or antibiotic’ 10 days before or after application of Rose Care.
  • Shelf Life/Expiry Date: 24 Months or 24 Months from date of manufacturing
